description.value: At 15th level, when the gunslinger has at least 1 grit point, she gains the benefit of the @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.KQYCRLEdD4bGA5ak]{evasion}, @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.7WaQxnVaaoL4AGr8]{uncanny dodge}, and @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.ZfnHhhTFQVo0Lj4P]{improved uncanny dodge} rogue class features. She uses her gunslinger level as her rogue level for improved uncanny dodge.
